533840.name: The Music of Hidden Dimensions 3
533840.description:
This pack contains the original soundtrack from Hidden Dimensions 3, as well as two longer variations of this track. Also included are two bonus tracks in a similar musical genre from the same artist.

Tracklisting :
Cluster Filaments (OST, 4:00)
Supercluster (OST variation, 11:59)
Supercluster Complex (OST variation, 23:52)
Ultraphrygian Prime (bonus, 16:52)
Well Of Dreams (bonus, 17:37)

Total playing time : 74:21
